stories.text:
Recently I acquired a new workstation (Lenovo P620) that only has usb-c connection and for whatever reason (there is an oficial bug for it, and I dont want to deal with that), my monitors don't work with usb-c. Therefore, I'm in search for a docking station / usb-c hub that is: * Compatible with Macbook Pro 2019 and Lenovo P620, both with usb-c entry. * Works with 2 monitors with either display port or hdmi connection * Ideally, easy to switch back and forward the workstation and laptop connections.

There are many options online, but thought this would be a great place to get recommendations!
stories.title: Ask HN: Recommendations for Dock Station / Hub
